summary: To effectively carry out our ongoing academic and research commitments, we kindly request your approval to use Lab 116 during after-hours and holidays from 8:00 AM to 11:30 PM. Date: 15/10/2025 Subject: Request for Extended Access to Lab 116 for Project Work Respected Sir/Madam, We, the second-year students of M.Tech CSE AI and M.Sc MI from the School of Computer Science and Engineering, are currently engaged in intensive academic and research activities. Lab 116 provides essential computational resources, access to the DGX server, and a conducive research environment necessary for our project and research work. MI (Second Year) School of Computer Science and Engineering Digital University Kerala Attachments: 1. Project guide signatures for verification and approval List of Students: MTech CSE: 1. List of students requesting extended access to Lab 116 2. The M.Tech students are pursuing their project work and internship, while the M.Sc. We also request that all lab amenities and resources be made available during these extended hours to ensure smooth and uninterrupted project work.
